title: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view
description:
Description: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Try to select any item in the outline view.

Observed behavior: When attempting to select an item for the first time in the library outline view, the focus jumps to the library file node instead of selecting the desired item.

Expected behavior: The first time I select the label item in the library outline view, it should be selected without the focus jumping to the library file node.
